pageContext.claim: “OK and as you know he [special counsel Robert Mueller] has -- Comey is his best friend. I had a very, very nasty business transaction with Bob Mueller, very nasty.”
pageContext.analysis: Former FBI director James Comey and Mueller are not best friends, just former work colleagues. The "nasty" business dispute is Mueller having resigned from the Trump National Golf Club in Sterling, Virginia, in October 2011. Trump has said the resignation stemmed from a dispute over fees but Mueller's office has denied there was any dispute.
